full_text: There is growing overlap between America’s five tech behemoths. Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Microsoft are beginning to echo the rivalry between Alibaba and Tencent https://t.co/D5MHyhPmuK

localize.full_text: 美国五大科技巨头之间的重合度越来越高。Alphabet、亚马逊、苹果、Facebook和微软开始呼应阿里巴巴和腾讯之间的竞争https://t.co/D5MHyhPmuK。
美國五大科技巨頭之間的重合度越來越高。Alphabet、亞馬遜、蘋果、Facebook和微軟開始呼應阿里巴巴和騰訊之間的競爭https://t.co/D5MHyhPmuK。
